response.overview: Everyone agrees Harry is annoying. Everyone agrees that they hate him too. So why are they at his graduation party? Well, this all unravels once he is found dead at the bottom of the stairs… And one person, Vista, believes she is solely to blame. And to make things even worse… the host’s psychotic girlfriend comes knocking at the door.
response.tagline: He thought it was his dinner party. Instead, it was his funeral.
response.title: Valium
